mapper.select: SELECT id, orders_id, item_id, item_name, product_price, quantity FROM order_item
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_item (orders_id, item_id, item_name, product_price, quantity) VALUES (#{ordersId}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{productPrice}, #{quantity})
mapper.update: UPDATE order_item SET orders_id = #{ordersId}, item_id = #{itemId}, item_name = #{itemName}, product_price = #{productPrice}, quantity = #{quantity} WHERE id = #{id}
